Html:
From documentation it is not clear, can a destination be the same as source?

Also on page http://ctt.codeplex.com/documentation parameters:  should be (p:) not (d:)

I've tested and confirmed that you can update the file in place(I recommend you to make  backup before)

e.g.

ctt s:..\web.config t:WebConfig.CTT d:..\web.config
